custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I load the tab bar in 10.x for the first time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I will see a coachmark shown above the tab bar
(example attached)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the close button is tapped at the top of the coachmark
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the coachmark will be dismissed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user tapps the app anywhere except the coachmark itself
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the coachmark will be dismissed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I load the tab bar in 10.x for the second time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will not see a coachmark shown above the tab bar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap Labs from the menu 10.x in a debug build
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see a lab that says coachmark

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap on the coachmark Lab in the debug build
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will be able to demo 4 different locations of the coachmark appearing

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN enable_coachmark_bottom_navigation is set to false for the firebase config for your build
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the coachmark will not display when conditions for display are otherwise met

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN enable_coachmark_bottom_navigation is set to true for the firebase config for your build
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the coachmark will display when conditions for display are also met

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the device language is set to English
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the coachmark text will be in English

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the coachmark text will be in Spanish
